00028 static VerseKey staticKey;

00030 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::CSwordBibleModuleInfo( SWModule* module )
00031     : CSwordModuleInfo(module), m_lowerBound(0), m_upperBound(0) {
00032     m_bookList = 0;
00033     m_cachedLocale = "unknown";
00034     m_hasOT = m_hasNT = -1;
00035 
00036 
00037 }
00038 
00039 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::CSwordBibleModuleInfo( const CSwordBibleModuleInfo& m ) : CSwordModuleInfo(m), m_lowerBound(0), m_upperBound(0) {
00040     if (m.m_bookList) {
00041         m_bookList = new QStringList();
00042         *m_bookList = *m.m_bookList;
00043     }   
00044     m_hasOT = m.m_hasOT;
00045     m_hasNT = m.m_hasNT;
00046     m_cachedLocale = m.m_cachedLocale;  
00047 }
00048 
00049 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordBibleModuleInfo::clone(){
00050     return new CSwordBibleModuleInfo(*this);
00051 }
00052 
00053 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::~CSwordBibleModuleInfo(){
00054     delete m_bookList;
00055 }
00056 
00058 QStringList* CSwordBibleModuleInfo::books() {
00059     if (m_cachedLocale != backend()->booknameLanguage()){   //if the locale has changed
00060         delete m_bookList;
00061         m_bookList = 0;
00062     }
00063     
00064     if (!m_bookList) {
00065         m_bookList = new QStringList(); 
00066         if (m_hasOT == -1)
00067             m_hasOT = hasTestament(OldTestament);
00068         if (m_hasNT == -1)
00069             m_hasNT = hasTestament(NewTestament);
00070             
00071         int min = 0;                
00072         int max = 1;
00073         //find out if we have ot and nt, only ot or only nt
00074         if (m_hasOT>0 && m_hasNT>0) { //both
00075             min = 0;
00076             max = 1;
00077         }
00078         else if (m_hasOT>0 && !m_hasNT) { //only OT
00079             min = 0;
00080             max = 0;
00081         }
00082         else if (!m_hasOT && m_hasNT>0) { //only NT
00083             min = 1;
00084             max = 1;
00085         }
00086         else if (!m_hasOT && !m_hasNT) { //somethings wrong here! - no OT and no NT
00087             qWarning("CSwordBibleModuleInfo (%s) no OT and not NT! Check your config!", module()->Name());
00088             min = 0;
00089             max = -1;
00090         }
00091 
00092     if (m_hasOT)
00093       m_lowerBound.key("Genesis 1:1");
00094     else
00095       m_lowerBound.key("Matthew 1:1");
00096     if (!m_hasNT)
00097       m_upperBound.key("Malachi 4:6");
00098     else
00099       m_upperBound.key("Revelation of John 22:21");
00100 
00101         staticKey.setLocale(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());
00102         for (int i = min; i <= max; ++i) {
00103             for ( int j = 0; j < staticKey.BMAX[i]; ++j) {
00104                 m_bookList->append( QString::fromLocal8Bit(staticKey.books[i][j].name) );
00105 //              m_bookList->append( QString::fromUtf8(staticKey.books[i][j].name) );
00106             }
00107         }
00108         m_cachedLocale = backend()->booknameLanguage();     
00109     }
00110     return m_bookList;
00111 }
00112 
00114 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::chapterCount(const unsigned int book) {
00115     int result = 0;
00116     if ( (book >= 1) && book <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[0] && hasTestament(OldTestament)) {        //Is the book in the old testament?
00117      result = (staticKey.books[0][book-1].chapmax);
00118     }
00119     else if ((book >= 1) && (book - staticKey.BMAX[0]) <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[1] && hasTestament(NewTestament) ) { //is the book in the new testament?
00120         result = (staticKey.books[1][book-1-staticKey.BMAX[0]].chapmax);
00121     }
00122     return result;
00123 }
00124 
00125 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::chapterCount(const QString& book) {
00126   return chapterCount( bookNumber(book) );
00127 }
00128 
00131 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::verseCount( const unsigned int book, const unsigned int chapter ) {
00132     unsigned int result = 0;
00133     if (book>=1 && (book <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[0]) && hasTestament(OldTestament) ) { //Is the book in the old testament?
00134         if (chapter <= chapterCount(book) ) //does the chapter exist?
00135             result = (staticKey.books[0][book-1].versemax[chapter-1]);
00136     }
00137     else if (book>=1 && (book - staticKey.BMAX[0]) <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[1] && hasTestament(NewTestament)) {  //is the book in the new testament?
00138         if (chapter <= chapterCount(book) ) //does the chapter exist?
00139             result = staticKey.books[1][book-1-staticKey.BMAX[0]].versemax[chapter-1];
00140     }
00141     return result;
00142 }
00143 
00144 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::verseCount( const QString& book, const unsigned int chapter ) {
00145 //  qWarning("book is %s", book.latin1());
00146   return verseCount( bookNumber(book), chapter );
00147 }
00148 
00149 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::bookNumber(const QString &book){
00150     unsigned int bookNumber = 0;
00151     bool found = false;
00152     staticKey.setLocale(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());
00153     int min = 0;
00154     int max = 1;    
00155     //find out if we have ot and nt, only ot or only nt
00156     if ((m_hasOT>0 && m_hasNT>0) || (m_hasOT == m_hasNT == -1)) {
00157         min = 0;
00158         max = 1;
00159         bookNumber = 0;
00160     }
00161     else if (m_hasOT>0 && !m_hasNT) {
00162         min = 0;
00163         max = 0;
00164         bookNumber = 0;     
00165     }
00166     else if (!m_hasOT && m_hasNT>0) {
00167         min = 1;
00168         max = 1;
00169         bookNumber = staticKey.BMAX[0];     
00170     }
00171     else if (!m_hasOT && !m_hasNT) {
00172         min = 0;
00173         max = -1; //no loop
00174         bookNumber = 0;
00175     }
00176     
00177     for (int i = min; i <= max && !found; ++i) {
00178         for ( int j = 0; j < staticKey.BMAX[i] && !found; ++j) {
00179             ++bookNumber;
00180             if (book == QString::fromLocal8Bit( staticKey.books[i][j].name) )
00181 //          if (book == QString::fromUtf8( staticKey.books[i][j].name) )
00182                 found = true;
00183         }
00184     }       
00185     return bookNumber;
00186 }
00187 
00189 const bool CSwordBibleModuleInfo::hasTestament( CSwordBibleModuleInfo::Testament type ) {
00190     if (m_hasOT == -1 || m_hasNT == -1) {           
00191         *module() = TOP; //position to first entry
00192         VerseKey key( module()->KeyText() );
00193         if (key.Testament() == 1) { // OT && NT
00194             m_hasOT = 1;
00195         }
00196         else if (key.Testament() == 2) { //no OT
00197             m_hasOT = 0;
00198         }
00199         
00200         *module() = BOTTOM;
00201         key = module()->KeyText();
00202         if (key.Testament() == 1) { // only OT, no NT
00203             m_hasNT = 0;
00204         }
00205         else if (key.Testament() == 2) { //has NT
00206             m_hasNT = 1;
00207         }
00208     }
00209 
00210     switch (type) {
00211         case OldTestament:
00212             return m_hasOT>0;
00213         case NewTestament:
00214             return m_hasNT>0;
00215 
00216         default:
00217             return false;
00218     }
00219 }

00223   return m_lowerBound;

00227 CSwordVerseKey CSwordBibleModuleInfo::upperBound() const {
00228   return m_upperBound;
